sentence.Network_en: Anatomize knowledge and life, lay a way to success for the students.
sentence.Network_cn: 解剖知识,解剖人生, 为学生铺就成才路.

sentence.Network_en: I am going to have biology experiment. We will anatomize mouse today.
sentence.Network_cn: 我生物实验. 今天是解剖老鼠.

sentence.Network_en: But, the teaching material that I anatomize a class today is him!
sentence.Network_cn: 可是, 我今天解剖课的教材就是他 呀 !

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语单词词根词缀学习法1_Conan_新浪博客 ... anatomy:n. 解剖 anatomize:vt. 解剖,仔细分析 epitome:n. 典型,梗(衣服和皮都切掉).

list.abs: anatomic(al) 解剖学的anatomic articulator 解剖式咬合器anatomic lens 解剖透镜
anamorphote lens 像歪曲透镜anatomical lens 解剖镜ancillary lens 附加透镜, 附加镜
英语单词查询 ... anatomical lens 解剖镜 anatomical physiology 解剖生理学 anatoxin reaction 变性毒素反应.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from medieval Latin anatomizare, from anatomia (see anatomy)

entry.def: If you anatomise a subject or an issue, you examine it in great detail.

example.ex: The magazine is devoted to anato-mizing the inadequacies of liberalism.
example.tran: 该杂志致力于剖析自由主义的不足之处。

sentences.sentence: "anatomize the bodies of the victims of this strange disease"

means.word_mean: 2. analyze down to the smallest detail;

sentences.sentence: "This writer anatomized the depth of human behavior"
